a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Prevalence, new cases and deaths from HIV/AIDS, World, 1990 to
To fit all three measures on the same visualization the total number of people living with HIV has been divided by ten (i.e. in
2019 there were 36.8 million people living with HIV).
Number of people living with HIV
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2019)
